Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Launcher = Tool.Handle
local Character local Player local Humanoid local Torso
local EggsToClone = { 'ChocolateEgg', 'CannonicalEgg', 'EggoEgg', 'MoonEgg', 'SuperSonicEgg' }
local Eggs_Model = Game.Lighting:WaitForChild('Eggs') local WorkspaceEggs_Model = Game.Workspace:FindFirstChild('Eggs')
local function FindPartInModel(model) local mChildren = model:GetChildren() for i = 1, #mChildren do if mChildren[i]:IsA('BasePart') then return mChildren[i] end end for i = 1, #mChildren do if #mChildren[i]:GetChildren() >= 1 then return FindPartInModel(mChildren[i]) end end end
local function CleanModel(model) local mChildren = model:GetChildren() for i = 1, #mChildren do if mChildren[i]:IsA('StringValue') or mChildren[i]:IsA('IntValue') or mChildren[i]:IsA('NumberValue') then mChildren[i]:Destroy() end end local part = FindPartInModel(model) return model, part end
local function MakeFake(egg) local eChildren = egg:GetChildren() for _, child in pairs(eChildren) do if child:IsA('Script') or child:IsA('LocalScript') then child:Destroy() else MakeFake(child) end end return egg end
Tool.Enabled = true local function OnActivated() if not Humanoid or not Torso then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
print('Tool is enabled')
Tool.Enabled = false
local target = Humanoid.TargetPoint local egg = Eggs_Model:FindFirstChild(EggsToClone[math.random(1, #EggsToClone)]):Clone() print('Found egg ', egg) local eggPart egg, eggPart = CleanModel(egg)
if math.random() > 0.1 then egg = MakeFake(egg) local eConnection = eggPart.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent and Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hitPart.Parent) then local gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') gui.Parent = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hitPart.Parent):WaitForChild('PlayerGui')
local tLabel = Instance.new('TextLabel') tLabel.Text = "IT IS A FAKE. BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME" tLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) tLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 50) tLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 tLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 0.5, -25) tLabel.Parent = gui
Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(gui, 2.0) if eConnection then eConnection:disconnect() end end end) Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(egg, 4.5) else Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(egg, 55) end egg.Parent = WorkspaceEggs_Model eggPart.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0 eggPart.Velocity = (target - Torso.Position).unit * 30.0 print('Fire in the hole') wait(5.5) Tool.Enabled = true
end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') end
local function OnUnequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
